name: WATCHER (tehwalkingtrash)
description:
A small game made for the MSPaint's Jam.

 In this game, you, Little Sibling No24, are tasked with monitoring the Secret Meeting of the Siblings, the elite members of the Holiest Conspiracy.

Detect the traitors inside the Siblings Circle, and secure the Holiest Conspiracy's secrecy (and maybe become a Sibling yourself :)))!!

Be sure to check out the assignment's tutorial before you begin!!

Gameplay time: 2 minutes

KNOWN ISSUES: The speech in the main game may finish abruptly in some cases or be prolonged, with no words. This is probably affected by connection speed. Other than that, the game will most probably run smoothly; if otherwise, please let me know in the comments.

Also this game won't load on Brave browser for some reason; better try another browser (Chrome and Firefox are suggested, I cannot say for other browsers).

WARNING: Brief mention of violence and nazis, awful writing and bad English (sorry in advance, English is not my first language)

Thnx for playing ^_^
